title: Has the Mayor of Alabama Mark Chambers contacted the murder of lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, gay, bisexual and transgender (LGBT) persons?
subtitle: Some appeal to the Chambers to resign after the comment has given rise to controversy about their small community.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Mark Chambers, Mayor of Carbon Hill, Alaa, wrote on Facebook that members of the LGBT community must "kill."
